matlab hough

20 Mar 2014

公路车道检测。

1、原始图 与 叠加后

2、腐蚀、重构 与 相减

3、霍夫变换检测线上色、根据直线方程绘制新图

4、坐标系绘制曲线

由于图片读取的坐标系是第四象限，而绘制曲线是第一象限，所以两图关于 x 轴对称。

5、计算得到的 '*' 点（160, 240）到两条直线的垂直长度

6、Codes

  1 %% clean command window
  2 clc
  3 
  4 %% original road image
  5 % road image: 320 x 240
  6 I = imread('img.jpg');
  7 figure;
  8 subplot(121), imshow(I);
  9 title('original image');
 10 
 11 %% im2double
 12 % im2double 将图片转化为 double 类型的矩阵
 13 % immultiply 图片相乘，使色彩强度增加
 14 di = im2double(I);
 15 I = immultiply(di, di);
 16 subplot(122), imshow(I);
 17 title('immultiply')
 18 
 19 %% erode and recon
 20 % 腐蚀与重构
 21 % 将原图与重构的图片相减，能够过滤背景中的大部分信息
 22 z_erode1 = imerode(I, ones(4,71));
 23 z_recon1 = imreconstruct(z_erode1, I);
 24 
 25 newI = imsubtract(I, z_recon1);
 26 figure;
 27 subplot(131), imshow(z_erode1);
 28 title('image erode');
 29 subplot(132), imshow(z_recon1);
 30 title('image reconstruct');
 31 subplot(133), imshow(newI);
 32 title('imsubtract');
 33 
 34 %% hough
 35 % candy edge
 36 % 霍夫变换 candy 边缘检测法
 37 BW = edge(im2bw(newI), 'canny');
 38 [H, T, R] = hough(BW);
 39 % peaks in hough
 40 %figure,imshow(H, [], 'XData', T, 'YData', R, 'InitialMagnification', 'fit');
 41 %xlabel('\theta'), ylabel('\rho');
 42 %axis on, axis normal, hold on;
 43 
 44 P = houghpeaks(H, 5, 'threshold', ceil(0.3*max(H(:))));
 45 x = T(P(:,2));
 46 y = R(P(:,1));
 47 %plot(x, y, 's', 'color', 'white');
 48 
 49 lines = houghlines(BW, T, R, P, 'FillGap', 5, 'MinLength', 7);
 50 figure;
 51 subplot(121),imshow(I), hold on;
 52 title('Lines');
 53 max_len = 0;
 54 % 为霍夫变换提取的直线上色
 55 for k = 1:length(lines);
 56     xy = [lines(k).point1; lines(k).point2];
 57     plot(xy(:,1), xy(:,2), 'LineWidth', 2, 'Color', 'green');
 58     plot(xy(1,1),xy(1,2),'x','LineWidth',2,'Color','yellow');
 59     plot(xy(2,1),xy(2,2),'x','LineWidth',2,'Color','red');
 60     
 61     len = norm(lines(k).point1 - lines(k).point2);
 62     Len(k) = len;
 63     if (len > max_len)
 64         max_len = len;
 65         xy_long = xy;
 66     end
 67 end
 68 plot(xy_long(:,1),xy_long(:,2),'LineWidth',2,'Color','blue');
 69 
 70 %%  Get two longest line 
 71 % L1 L2
 72 % 获取两条最长的直线
 73 [L1 Index1]=max(Len(:));
 74 Len(Index1)=0;
 75 [L2 Index2]=max(Len(:));
 76 
 77 x1=[lines(Index1).point1(1) lines(Index1).point2(1)];
 78 y1=[lines(Index1).point1(2) lines(Index1).point2(2)];
 79 x2=[lines(Index2).point1(1) lines(Index2).point2(1)];
 80 y2=[lines(Index2).point1(2) lines(Index2).point2(2)];
 81 
 82 %% Slope of line
 83 % L1 -> K1; L2 -> K2
 84 % 直线斜率
 85 K1=(lines(Index1).point1(2)-lines(Index1).point2(2))/(lines(Index1).point1(1)-lines(Index1).point2(1));
 86 K2=(lines(Index2).point1(2)-lines(Index2).point2(2))/(lines(Index2).point1(1)-lines(Index2).point2(1));
 87 
 88 %% redraw a new image to show the road line
 89 % 重绘一张图，用 zeros 将置全黑
 90 [m,n] = size(BW); % 尺寸 m = 240, n = 320
 91 BW1=zeros(m,n);
 92 b1=y1(1)-K1*x1(1);
 93 b2=y2(1)-K2*x2(1);
 94 % 两次遍历图片上的点，若与直线 y1 y2重叠的点，则置1（即绘白色）
 95 % round to get the line
 96 % 第一次，对点四舍五入取整
 97 for x=1:n
 98     for y=1:m
 99         if y==round(K1*x+b1)|y==round(K2*x+b2)
100             BW1(y,x)=1;
101         end
102     end
103 end
104 % ceil to get the line
105 % 第二次，对点直接舍弃小数点取整
106 for x=1:n
107     for y=1:m
108         if ceil(K1*x+b1)==ceil(K2*x+b2)
109             y3=round(K1*x+b1);
110             BW1(1:y3-1,:)=0;
111         end
112     end
113 end
114 % 两次绘点能够更好地绘制直线
115 
116 subplot(122), imshow(BW1), hold on;
117 title('new road line');
118 plot(n/2, m, '*');
119 
120 %% Vertical distance of point to the line
121 % 点(160,240）到两条直线的垂直距离，即摄像头到线的距离（假定摄像头近似贴近路面）
122 figure, plot(x1, y1), hold on;
123 plot(x2, y2);
124 plot(n/2, m, '*');
125 
126 dl1 = abs(K1*(n/2) + m + b1)/sqrt(K1^2 + 1)
127 dl2 = abs(K2*(n/2) + m + b2)/sqrt(K2^2 + 1)
